top.description: The number of case notes retrieved per page. If no value is specified, the request retrieves a maximum of the top 50 notes.

startDateTime.description: The date and time of the start of data retrieval in ISO 8601 format

endDateTime.description: The date and time of the end of data retrieval in ISO 8601 format

dateTimeTarget.description: A parameter that allows you to sort by either created date or updated date

orderBy.description:
The fields by which the results are sorted. You can indicate multiple fields separated by commas (`,`).

Records are returned in descending order by default. To return records in ascending order, add the phrase `asc` after the parameter name.

Available fields:
* createdDateTime

Supported operators:
* `asc` - Ascending order
* `desc` - Descending order

TMV1-Filter.description:
Filter for retrieving a subset of case contents.

Supported fields:
|Field|Description|Possible values|
|---|---|---|
|creatorId|Creator Id of the case content|any string value|

Supported operators:
* 'eq' - Abbreviation of the operator 'equal to'
* 'and' - Logical operator 'and'
* 'or' - Logical operator 'or'
* 'not' - Logical operator 'not'
* '( )' - Symbols for grouping operands with their correct operator.
